promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple deer grass-type pokemon wearing wooden armor. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Barkstag, a a chibi cute simple deer grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Snapping Pincers, Sol Slice. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "grass" or "Barkstag". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, deer-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sunlight ray ambience
generatedDescription: Barkstag, the Forest Fawn Pokémon. Using its verdant antlers and light-infused hooves, it joyfully frolics in sunlit meadows, its Pincers and Sol Slice creating patches for new growth.
